subject: Application for Data Analyst Role
body_snippet: Hi HR Team, please find my CV attached. I have 3 years experience in SQL, Power BI, Python, and data cleaning. I am very interested in the Data Analyst position at your company. Looking forward to hearing from you.
body_full:
Hi HR Team,

Please find my CV attached. I have 3 years experience in SQL, Power BI, Python, and data cleaning.

I am very interested in the Data Analyst position at your company. In my current role at TechCorp, I have:
- Built 15+ dashboards in Power BI tracking key business metrics
- Written complex SQL queries for data extraction and reporting
- Automated monthly reports using Python scripts
- Managed data cleaning pipelines for 500K+ records

I hold a Bachelor's in Statistics from National University.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Priya Kumar
priya.kumar@email.com
+65 9123 4567

subject: Software Engineer Position - Application
body_snippet: Dear Hiring Manager, I am writing to express my interest in the Software Engineer position. I have 5 years of experience in full-stack development with React, Node.js, and AWS.
body_full:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Software Engineer position. I have 5 years of experience in full-stack development.

Technical Skills:
- Frontend: React, TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js, Python, FastAPI, Express
- Cloud: AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS), Docker, Kubernetes
- Database: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis

Key Achievements:
- Led migration of monolith to microservices serving 2M+ users
- Reduced API response time by 40% through caching optimization
- Mentored 4 junior developers

I hold an MS in Computer Science from Stanford University.

Best,
James Chen
james.chen@gmail.com
+1 415 555 0123

subject: Product Manager Application - Sarah Johnson
body_snippet: Hello, I'd like to apply for the Product Manager role. I have 7 years of product management experience at enterprise SaaS companies, including leading a team that grew ARR from $5M to $25M.
body_full:
Hello,

I'd like to apply for the Product Manager role. I have 7 years of product management experience at enterprise SaaS companies.

Highlights:
- Led product team that grew ARR from $5M to $25M in 3 years
- Managed product roadmap for 3 product lines with 50+ features
- Conducted 200+ customer interviews to inform product strategy
- Implemented OKR framework across 4 engineering teams
- Launched 2 products from 0 to 1, both achieving PMF within 6 months

Skills: Product Strategy, User Research, Agile/Scrum, SQL, Figma, JIRA, Data Analytics

I hold an MBA from Wharton and a BS in Engineering from MIT.

Best regards,
Sarah Johnson
sarah.johnson@outlook.com
+1 212 555 0456

Raj Patel

Aisha Rahman
